name: RainyDay (itch)
description:
Take your time to walk through a small stop motion and collage world and remember the days where you were looking forward to jump into the mud while feeling the droplets on your face.
Rainy day is a short point and click story and feel-good-game.

Ps: there is one bug you might face and will update the file as soon as I manage to fix it:

If your character doesnt move, click on it and it will work again
